content.detailedDescription: I do not know the exact date it was like august. at about 2am i was awaken to what sounded like a helicopter when i opened my eyes i saw what looked like a flashlight coming through my window at first i thought police helicopter looking for someone i looked out my window saw nothing layed back down saw lights through my window again this time when i looked out my window it looked like a flashlight again going house to house when i looked up i saw nothing again but could hear noise so i continued to look out the window all of a sudden the street lit up so bright on one side then the other it was the wierdest thing i ever saw so i continued to look out so i could see what it was  then all of a sudden i seen a reflection on my neighbors roof if was kinda rounded and had lights it looked like it was coming from out back. my husband was sitting in a chair in our room but it was like he wasnt moving i asked him to look but it was like frozen so i ran out back alone. i have a large deck i was standing on and there was a bright light that shone down on me. next thing i remember is standing on my back deck near my door and there was like a flash of light and like a swooshing noise i said to myself what was that kinda confused so i walked back in my house and it was eight oclock in the morning  my husband asked where i was and i explained what i rememebered and he laughed i was really scared and couldnt explain so just kinding he said maybe u saw a ufo.Thats when i started looking into it and the more i think about it i think i may have seen one. also for the longest time i had this wierd smell and taste all the time my hair started falling out in clumps and i was sick for a couple of days. after that there were airforc people aroung my neighborhood i saw trucks taking things from the woods  i also saw some strange figure i dont know maybe military but not to sound crazy maybe aliens i dont know i would like help to figure this out i saw people in white suits too
content.summary: Bright lights.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving on the highway at night the city of austin texas to our right. when i look over and see a glwoing light about the size of a quater. suddenly it turned into 3 or four balls of light that were slowly weaving in and out of each other. they would turn into 1 ball and then 3 or four balls for several minutes and then it became a sigular ball again for several more minutes and then it was just gone. we were freaking out!!!! it was unexplainable and i wonder what the hell we saw. people say we were on drugs but no drugs were involved this [cms/tg/pd] was jsut crazy!!!
content.summary: Several balls of light hovering in sky over austin, texas.

content.detailedDescription: During the summer of 1978 i was outside playing in the yard and heard a humming sound. i was attentive as a child to the military aircraft that are always flying over our home. after hearing a humming sound i looked up and saw a small aircraft that i had not seen before. i watched the craft fly slowly eastward for about a minute and was out of site over the trees. i estimate flying at about 1500-2000'. the wings were a swept wing design placed in the rear of the craft, but forward facing. towards the front of the craft were smaller, cannard like wings.I have heard prop planes and have not heard anything that was similar to what i heard that day. i have looked at different types of experimental aircraft and not have found anything that was flying at the time that was close to what i witnessed. the only aircraft that may resemble is a velocity aircraft. the only noted difference is the wings are swept back. after serving in the air force and being around aircraft, i have yet to see any type of aircraft that has this design.
content.summary: Object shaped like small aircraft with forward facing wings- not developed at time of observation

content.detailedDescription:
Scientists are now openly confirming the existence of an object that they are calling nemesis or death star that has created a cycle of extraction level events here on earth.

the thing is we can not take this lightly right now... simply because it is mainstream, not theory conspiracy related anymore... this changes everything... everything. they may as well call this thing nibiru and get it over with. 

full details and background into the official announcement,
http://theufologynetwork.Freeforum.Ca/2012-vf59.Html


slushpup
content.summary: Planet x , brown dwarf, nemesis, death star, or nibiru. what ever you want to call it. nasa confirms it is real

content.detailedDescription:
One winter night as i was fast asleep in the west bedroom near the stairs,
i was awaken by a strange pulsating hum. sitting strait up, i turned to the left to see three ghostly figures materialize in the next room as they were approaching my bedside.  please remember that we had no electric and i had never been to a movie or heard a radio show to that point.  two of the creatures looked just like the gray aliens you see in the movies and the one in the center was much taller and looked different.  as they got closer they told me to relax and go back to sleep telepathically. the floating sensation i felt helped stop my nervous shaking as i blacked out.  the next morning my grandmother met me half way to the kitchen and asks if i was all right.  she said that i had sunburn on the left side of my face and looked very tired. in the back seat of the new buick on our way to the farm i felt compelled to lay down on the floor with my back to the front seat.  the telepathic message was like the one i received from the three ghosts.  moments after laying down we t-boned another car on route 13 near blackbird.  everyone except i was seriously injured and taken to the hospital. the year i believe was 1959 while at the park i noticed about 12 flying saucers to the west of the park.  to my great surprise i had a visit the next day while at my friends home that lived around the corner from my grandparents home at 806 brown st.  john's father answered the door to find two air force people in uniform asking to speak with me in private.  my mother stood with the air force officer to my left and the sergeant stood in front as another man entered the room dressed in black wearing a hat and dark sunglasses. i was asked to tell what i saw as follows: i saw bright round objects mostly in triangular groups of three flying in a manor not like any aircraft known.
they were able to stop and turn on a dime and when they departed to an altitude near space they took off so fast that they appeared to vanish at about a 30 degree angle into space. for the next hour the air force guys tried to get me to change my story and i was growing tired of repeating myself.  i then parroted back one of the officer's stories as a way to make them leave. i noticed the officer look up at the guy in black for approval, as i could  see the guy in black shake his head left and right. now i knew i had to convince the guy in black and realized that the officer was taking his orders from him.  so i came up with a better idea that got the approval from the big boss in black. the man in black never said a word to me even after asking him direct questions.  he then folded his notebook and left followed by my mother and the officer.  there are many other strange stories about hard to believe events, but either you believe or not will make no difference.

this is my recorded statement so others like me will take some comfort in knowing that they are not alone?
content.summary: Three ghostly figures materialize in the next room as they were approaching my bedside.

content.detailedDescription: Around, 12:30 a fast flying object going about 150 or more passed over my house heading east. it was triangular with two things sticking out of the front. it had weird writing on the bottom and looked to be flying backwards. it made a low humming sound. i had a friend with me he too saw it. it looked to be as big as 5 cars.
content.summary: Fast flying grey object, triangle like

content.detailedDescription: At 3:13 am eastern time i was awakened by the  4-5 brightest flashes i have ever encountered. i thought lightning had struck my home becuase it was so intense, but i never heard a sound (thunder). following this extreme flash that resembled the intensity of a arc welder i proceeded outside to see if i could observe anything obvious. i walked outside and this strange feeling was surrounding me. there was absolutely "zero wind" it was not raining, so i knew it could not have been a lighting strike. i went across the street to my neighbors house as i noticed she was lighting candles in her house for light. all power was gone, and i knew it was not a transformer blowing up as it could not do this 4-5 times. she also did not feel normal and this is why she also awakened. we turned on her battery operated radio and could not get any signal for any stations - just white noise. she also had a xm radio and this picked up stations. our cell phones also would not get a signal. we both decided to get in the car and take a drive just to see if anyone had been in a car wreck and hit a power line. we both jointly commented at the same time of the erie animal behavior. i have never seen so many animals walking around as stunned as we were. after driving for a while and not seeing anything we decided to call authorites in case someone had run into something and needed help. the operator had not reportings of power outages and accidents. this was approx 15-20 mins after the sighting. our radios and cell phones by this time were working in the car and power was still out. when we got back to our neighbor hood and proceded to go back inside we heard a strange deep whisteling noise in the sky. after the sound had left power was restored. my neighbors solar cell system is not working and the intense light overloaded her electrical system. the company that came out to repair said they had never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Did not actually see a craft, however i did see a very scary flash of bright light 4-5 times that was blinding

content.detailedDescription:
on tuesday march 9, fox 8 news in cleveland featured a report of an individual observing strange lights from his apartment window for the sixth consecutive night. the euclid native reported the lights would start out bright and then gradually dim. as soon as the lights begin to dim, the object moves away. since no official mufon report had been filed, i drove to the area of the sightings on both march 11 and 12. 
	on march 11 the object was reportedly seen and disappeared before i arrived. on march 12 i choose a different location which provided a better view and saw a light matching the news report to the northwest. the light was orange-white and about the size and intensity of venus two-fingers above the horizon.  the light was seen at least three times between 7:15pm and 7:48pm starting as a bright light, then dimming and in the first observation moving to the southwest. the light was observed by not only myself but three other individuals. the light or should i say lights were observed by naked eye, video camera, and binoculars.  through binoculars not only was one light seen, but a second the same color and of lower intensity slightly above and to the right. a faint light was also seen fading in and out in the same area until 8:08pm. 
	there was light air traffic in the area and the two closest airports are burke lakefront airport 10 miles to the southwest and cleveland-hopkins airport 18 miles to the southwest. first thought is it may be an airplane circling over lake erie for an approach to cleveland-hopkins airport and the bright light was the landing light. the sky was partially cloudy and the light could be dimming either by cloud cover or the plane disappearing in the distance. as we watched the light/s the emotions of the group were mixed. 

media is available and is a large file.
content.summary: Light/s seen over lake erie from euclid beach

content.detailedDescription:
I was wondering if anybody has reported any ufo sightings in cannock town on thursday night 11th march 2010 around 7pm.
 
i was walking into my kitchen of my flat on thursday night and i looked up thinking that aeroplane is flighing really low and slow, then i looked properly and noticed it wasnt a shape of a plane or helecopter and the lights were different to. the lights were changing from white, to green to red.
 
it then just stopped suddenly and hovered very still in the air, looked like it was over the cannock town center (uk), it moved up and down a couple of times not drastically, then a few minutes later it shot over to my right, towards the a5 and hovered there for another 20 mins or so still with the lights flashing, it had a small dome like shape ontop.
 
i also noticed when it was over the area of the a5 road there was another set of the exact same lights way up in the clouds, higher than a plane, also just hovering in one place and not moving.
 
i was i had been able to take a picture as nobody believes me, thats why i am wondering if anybody else has reported this? i have never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: Ufo sighting over cannock town

content.detailedDescription: There were several sightings around this area at the time. my father was the first to point it out to me. we were outside one afternoon around 8 or 8:30 pm when he pointed out a bright object to me over the area of melton hill lake. he asked me if i saw this star that was out at the time and i said yes i was around 10 years old at the time . he told me if i watched it it would move slowly across the sky which it did. i think we all got our best look at it one night though when he woke us up about 11 pm and said we needed to go outside. there was an object close to 30 feet in length no more than 100 feet above the power lines outside of our house. we were not the only ones to se this as well the people who lived on our street were for the most part all outside. this object was moveing slowly without an disernable sound.Multi colored lighst seemed to be pulseing around the outside of the object. we observed this object for around 40 min untill it abruptly seemed to shoot stright up and dissappear. the sightings of the moving star like object reoccured severl times over the years following this event. i still wonder to this day if what we were doing at the oakridge national labs at the time had something to do with these sightings.Description of object : cigar shaped rounder at front more tapered at the rear? white or light gray in color with multi colored lights pulseing aroung the ouside skin.(possably comming from inside of object)
content.summary: This was one of a series of sightings around the oak ridge labs area.

content.detailedDescription: Me and a fellow employee were out on the flightline of an airfield waiting on another employee to inspect a part we were going to put on an aircraft. we got out to the aircraft at around 9pm. as soon as i stepped out i looked back toward the hangar and notice the lights. i asked my partner if he saw them. he said he did. there were six of them above the horizon. all were orange looking in color. the same color as the lights on the hangars roughly. i thought they were a stick of aircraft planning to shoot an approach to cairns army airfield. as we watched they very slowly drifted from right to left. they were southwest of cairns airfield. there was no sound only the lights. i called a employee in the hangar who also was looking at them on my cellphone. anyway, as we watched they started disappearing. my friend who was in the hangar said to him it looked like an army aircraft flew toward them and when it did they started disappearing. i didn't see that from my position. one by one they started disappearing till they were gone. me and my partner were discussing what we had seen while waiting for the other employee to come. about five min. later we saw two more of the lights suddenly appear in the same area but higher up. these lights stayed lit for several minutes then they disappeared. the one on the left disappeared first then the second. later i talked to at least two other employees who saw the lights besides me and my partner. i've seen ufo's on tv shows about the "phoenix lights" and to be honest these looked like them. honestly, if i had to guess i think they could have been flares from an aircraft at high altitude but i just don't know. i've never seen flares in this area all of my life but i suppose it is possible. other than that i have no idea what it was. but i know i'm not the only one who saw them. also there was no sound that we could hear. the lights were orange and no other lights were visible (such as position lights on aircraft). the whole time we saw them was roughly 9 to 9:20pm and positionally they looked to be over the south end of coffee county, alabama. but i don't now how far away they were. but it was southwest of cairns army airfield.
content.summary: 6 lights in the sky then 2 roughly five min. later.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving north on woodway drive, going toward loop 820 and trail lake dr. in fort worth, texas, when i looked up and saw a small disc shaped cloud that was stationary in the sky above us.  it was shaped like a ufo, but in the form of a cloud.  the wind was blowing around 33 miles per hour, it was very, very windy and there were no other clouds in the sky anywhere around the area. i pointed it out to my husband since i'm a big coast to coast listener, and i told him that i had heard that some ufo's will take the form of clouds.  he and i were watching it and remarking how it wasn't moving at all when all at once it disappeared..Poof it was gone.  we couldn't believe it but continued driving north.  about 15 minutes later we were on forest park blve. near downtown when we saw it again, the same shaped small disc shaped cloud, but farther north and lower to the horizan.  we had to make a turn and lost sight of it, but i really believe we may have seen something hidden as cloud in the sky.
content.summary: Very windy, cloudless day, small disc shaped stationary cloud, disappeared in a split second.  saw again farther north 15 min later.

content.detailedDescription: Was lookin toward south(mpls) and saw what appeared to be ufo.   was triangular and had white lights on all corners with a red flashing light in middle going from side to side and in the rear of craft there were two blue lights. i opened sliding glass door and looked closer and noticed that it was on same route as most passenger plane routes to msp airport, but the light configuration i thought was pretty wierd so, thats when i realized i couldnt hear the craft. i continued watching it but it did not follow the route but instead continued on a south western path rather than going to msp airport.   i did stand out on the patio and could hear the passenger planes at the same distance.  all im saying it definately was a ufo    not that it was alien but.... what do we have that capability?...Also it was not flying as fast as the regular planes     i really wish for the first time in my life that i had a video recorder  then i could discern it for myself.... i just hope someone else saw this other than me and my girlfriend.   i did feel pretty freaked out  cuz it was movin so slow and the gosh darn red lights goin back and forth  i just cant understand why, and why would it have been following the path of passenger planes only to go off in a different direction  it never zig zagged or anything just left out of my view  thats all    very strange.
content.summary: Dark triangle with lights at vertices - two witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on rt 11 west and as i came around a corner over a beaver pond was this oval shaped very bright, with small square windows and  bottom was like opague. i was scared and tried to turn my car around but i could not, i tried to go by it fast but as i pushe down on the gas petal i could not go faster, i remember seeing a white older truck pulled over on the side of the road. i remeber the light seeming to get brighter the next thing i remember was driving into my dooryard, my husband meet me at the door and asked where had i been it was 1:30am in the morning and i had started home from springfield at around 11 pm.

the next morning while showering i noticed a small back cylinder shaped about maybe all most an inch long in my leg, it didnot hurt. i had that black thing in my leg for about four years then it dissappeared.

my mother has also had several experiences.
content.summary: I say a ufo on rt 11 west from springfield to chester vt i lost some time

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaning over the top of my car talking on the phone to a friend, when i saw a round silver shiny object come out of a cloud, leave its environment maybe twenty feet and then dart into another cloud, as if it realized it had left cover. there was no sound, not a humming or the whir of a classic motor. 
as i was talking on the phone out of boredom, i looked upward as the event happened.
the clouds were about 100ft above ground (this is a 5' tall persons idea of height). the clouds were brilliant blue with a few large puffy clouds interspersed throughout the skyline.
i know it sounds odd and lasted less than 60 seconds....But i know i am not hallucinating. what is truly weird, it was if i could see seams in the craft....Were i too imagine it, first i would go with the '50's version of the inverted cup an saucer.......Which my father and i saw in 1960 anchorage alaska, secondly, i would expect them to be so advanced it would not have seams.
i knew exactly what i was seeing, a ufo...We don't have crafts like that in our military; my daughters are usaf & usarmy.
i was so excited and let down at the same time. i look for the old fashion ''saucers'', so i was kinda disappointed it was a ball. buy i knew what i saw was not anything i have flown in. i told the friend i was talking to at the time, she scoffed at me then said she believed me...But i have learned in the course of our friendship, that is not necessarily true.
once it left my vision, well, i have kept my eyes on the skies ever since, especially on semi-cloudy days...To no avail. i want to see more! 
so having seams was there anyone doing experiments?
i have copied the info from my journal.
to have made this up would take credence from my memory...A lie has no real life, this happened, whether i am believed or not, doesn't matter, i was there and i saw what i have reported here.
i drew in my journal within minutes of the event, but i don't posses the ability to send it to you except in snail mail. you still want it?
respectfully, 
"c"

p.S., my father [cms/tg/pid] (deceased) told me the usaf would not waste it's resources to bring all those men to roswell for a weather balloon.
content.summary: A silver ball

content.detailedDescription: I was walking and i felt something hot when sudenly there was many ufos and then i yelled and my watch stopped wrking
content.shape: Blimp,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cigar,   Cone,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop
content.summary: Very scary many ufos.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke a cigarette and was standing on my stoop when i noticed this star like object was moving very very slowly, as could be seen with other stars as reference points. it was a very clear night, and so i stared at it, knowing this could not be a plane or helicopter, but maybe a comet or maybe a satellite. i called my friend on the phone to talk to him about it but just as i was calling it started to speed up so i stared again and it seemed to accelerate at speeds nothing on earth could recreate, it was almost exponential, and then the light just went away (dissolved) over a period of .5-1 sec. not instantly, just faded away. at first, i was amazed, but now i really want some kind of explanation.
content.summary: Ufo still at first over sky, then accelerated away and disappeared after shooting across 2/3 of sky

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to lock my back door and noticed up in the north sky  three flash's illuminating the clouds then i went back in to tell my wife and get the night vision goggles. we went out and i could see a pretty good light through the tree's and which i could not see with the naked eye and as i fined tuned the goggles i noticed the ball of light was greater then anything i had seen. it looked as big as the moon behind the tree's. it was overcast and the moon comes in the east and the moon is only a quarter full.
right before we lost sight of it, it seemed to move to the east then disappeared. like it took off.
content.summary: Ball of light in tree's

content.detailedDescription:
It was july 1st, 2007 at 7:25pm & i was laying on the front lawn talking to my dad and the sky was clear. i looked up in the south-western sky and i saw an object moving slowly. i thought it was merely a plane or a helicopter, then i noticed there was no sound. at that point i told my dad to look at that object and tell me what he thought it was. we thought it was maybe an osprey, blimp or balloon- it was far away and difficult to tell it's shape. i even thought it was a trash bag.

as the object came directly above our home, we were able to see the shape very clearly. the unidentifiable craft was a very large flying pyramid. it looked nearly identical to the pyramid of giza, except it had a tall antenna with 3 horizontal bars & two areas on the side that were indented.

at that moment we realized it was a ufo. when i say "ufo", i don't mean an extraterrestrial craft, i mean that it was not a known craft that i have seen. the craft was flying at a very slow, steady speed in a strait line. it came from the south-west & kept going without pause to north-east. we watched it until we could no longer see it. the craft was brown in colour, had 4 sides & was flying fairly low, maybe 3-4 telephone poles up.

we saw this ufo on july 1st, 2007 at 7:25pm & watched it for approx. 5 mins. my dad and i were so busy analyzing the craft that i did not stop to think to get my camera! i'm still very upset that i didn't get my camera, it would have been a great picture too. this is not the first time i have seen ufos, but this particular sighting was the best one.

well, i attached a sketch of the "flying pyramid" (that's what i call this sighting). um, if i tell you about my sighting, you're not gonna report me to those men in black guys are you? that is why i hesitated for years to tell you.
content.summary: Pyramid-shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
What is happening on and around our sun? that is the question. it is now a hot spot for ufo's and also solar activity. all the while we here on earth are being hit by earth quakes and more. is all this connected.

i believe the answers are clear. check out the information below. i hope this helps you understand what we are faced with.
slushpup

soho captures multiple ufo's march 11 2010
http://theufologynetwork.Freeforum.Ca/soho-captures-multiple-ufos-march-11-2010-vt429.Html

the sun goes crazy and forms a celtic knot march 10 2010
http://theufologynetwork.Freeforum.Ca/the-sun-goes-crazy-and-forms-a-celtic-knot-march-10-2010-vt428.Html

massive disturbance on the sun. mar 8 2010
http://theufologynetwork.Freeforum.Ca/massive-disturbance-on-the-sun-dot-mar-8-2010-vt402.Html
content.summary: Strange things going on near the sun.

content.detailedDescription: I went to bed,woke up standing part way up a steep incline waiting for someone,there was a hugh ufo on the ground close to the edge of the path about 200 feet up,they were checking the edge to make sure the land would hold the weight.I was looking down at a small city- i was not sure where i was,i thought mexico maybe. there was some kind of disaster getting readyto happen.The man i was waiting for walked up to me and we went down to the city below to get people they wanted first.We went to a store,up the stairs to the second floor where the man,wife,2 children/they followed us,we gathered many people they wanted.This is a long story-in the mourning when they put me back i woke my friend janet up and told her about it,i turned the t v on and it was on  the  news i was in columbia sa .The nevado del ruiz volcano had killed 23,000 people.This ufo picked up thousands of people there was a second ufo  upstream from where the one i was on.They changed the outside shape so people could hold on,it came in three big waves of ice,trees dead animals and people,i am trying not two cry,but i do anyway.The lower deck had a hugh round columb going up with white railing,the light hurt my eyes the top deck had soft pink light,very nice.There were people just like me or you,different races,they were dressed in blue jumpsuits.I got in an argument with one of them because i refused to do something.When they put me back they put a ramp down the tall grey one asked me if i knew what my gift was- i felt stupid and said if your so smart why dont you tell me.  i am not good at computer stuff.I am 67 years old in a few weeks.Call if you want. i went to a shrink/he found no patholgy,said i get a little paranoid at times.
content.summary: Please call me [cms/tg/pd]  i need to tell this story before i die.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my covered front porch reading alien agenda ( really no joke) and i stepped off the porch to look for my dog.  i looked up and saw a gray reflective horseshoe shape object about 100 feet above me.  the object moved very slowly and seemed to disappear into the night, it was very dark gary, sort of reflecting, but hard to tell due to the night sky.  i had been reading this book and had a pen in my pocket and drew it in my book as i stood there. at first, i was stunned, was it my imagination?  i looked harder, i did not see it approaching me, it was just there and then moved slowly over me, very slowly and i was astonished it was so low to the ground.  i knew it was not like anything i had seen before, i live about 15 miles from will rogers intl airport.  but it wasn't a flight path normally used.  it seemed to be crawling over my head over the edge of the house and where i was standing about 10 feet from the porch.  i thought maybe it was a blimp, but did not have that shape, the horseshoe shape was clearly defined as was the two round fan shapped objects at the end of each side of the horseshoe that i seemed to be able to see thru.  as it was going slowly, over me i could see the sky thru the vent things.  the reflective surface was gray but the edges were sort of fuzzy, it seemed to reflect my house lights.  i brought it up at a mufon meeting a month later (i am a member) that 2 other people (also mufon members-a couple) had seen it the same night and and agreed that my picture i drew in the book was accurate.  i believe them because, while we were discussing things at the meeting, prior to my mentioning it, i showed the drawing to a the wife member sitting next to me.  she stated she had seen that and asked me to show her husband was standing at the back of the room.  i did and they both discussed the date, i had not told them the date yet, and they confirmed my date.  i believe they said there were others with them when they saw it.  i reported this out loud to the group with the dirctor there.  it is not like anything i have seen before, 200 feet long  and 50 feet wide with a chunk out of the center about 1/3 of the way in from the end that gave it a horseshoe look.  at the tip of each horseshoe was a round fan with blades (or thats how i perceived it) that i could see through to the night sky.  i had enough time to draw it as it moved over my head, about 2 minutes. i looked up after drawing it one more time and good not see it any longer.  in my excitement, i did not notice  if it made noise that i could hear at the time, but upon memory i could swear it made a very quiet humming noise.  i am submitting this as a mufon member of my own accord, no one had prompted me at the time to record this event. maybe it is an ifo because the state director at the time did not ask me to report it or do an interview to document the event, he did not approach the other couple either that i know of.  by the way the other couple was in tulsa area, i am in mustang, just west of oklahoma city.  that is a very long distance, over 120 miles away seen on the same night by me a mufon member and them also mufon members, what's the chance of that!    i do have several other sightings  to record.  maybe they are not ufo's.  military maybe but not like anything i have seen.  but that's what i (we) saw.  i showed the drawing to 2 family members who work in aviation navigation and also military air traffic control and it was unfamiliar to them.  i will notify our new state dirctor that i filed this report.  i originally drew it with pen, but after trying to make a picture of it by hand, i decided to see if i could get the image of the surface to show on a paint program.  this is very close to what i saw.
content.summary: I look up and saw a gray reflective horseshoe shape object about 100 feet above me

content.detailedDescription: i saw a curious thing that just kept making me stare trying to figure it out. i am staying on the 2nd floor of a hotel facing west. i came out of my room onto the outdoor walkway(it was fully dark out) and noticed an aircraft flying slowly, south-to-north directly west of me maybe 2500 to 3800 feet away and at a low altitude. the vehicle consisted of maybe 8 to 10 dim colored lights-red, white, green, possibly violet, and amber. i was sure it was just a helicopter going to nearby duke medical center (i installed security cameras on that helipad and at the nat. guard helo base in raleigh)and maybe it was. but there were several odd things about it: 1)all the lights were tiny, constant & dim and seemed to be behind the slightest fog. there were no strobes. 2) there were no green or red lights near where wingtips should be if a winged craft. 3)the lights didn't make a distinct t shape-maybe a fat-stubby t (so again-like a helo) but... 4) it was silent! as it seemed to be less than 4000 feet away i expected to hear rotor and engine noise: nothing-even after all the local car traffic stopped...Silence. i have heard people claim that ufo 'craft' have mimicked human aircraft lights, but imperfectly. this fit my pictures of what that might look like. (cue twilight zone music)
content.summary: Cluster of dim lights, low, slow, silent (mimicking an aircraft?)

content.detailedDescription: I was watching chemtrails being made all around my house in branford, ct. a lot of chemtrails were being made and i asked my friend what is that.  he said a chemtrail and i said look below.  i saw a white cigar shaped object, which is odd because i never heard of a white one. it was southwest and proceeded to go north.  i looked at it, ran up the driveway to take a picture.  took one picture that didnt come out good and when i was taking the second picture my hall-full batery camera completly died.  i looked up and the object had disappeared into a chemtrail.  then two minutes later a grey or white helicoper came out of the tree line and it looked like it was looking for this object.  i asked my friend if i should take a picture and he said no.  as he said that a flash came from the helicopter.  i have no idea what this was; maybe a government aircraft that just disappeared or something from out of this world.  i don't know if this has a connection with chemtrails?  also, the object only lasted about 20-30 seconds before vanishing before my eyes.
content.summary: White cigar shaped ufo disapears in front of my eyes

content.detailedDescription:
When i was a child in 1972, i was 6 i was playing in my backyard in  a suburb of detroit, when all of the sudden i turned around due to a breeze i felt over my shoulder and there was a round silver craft with 3 rows of light going around the craft hovering over my neighbors garage and i ran inside to try to convince my mother of what i saw to no avail,i went back out just in time to catch its exit and watched it as it disappeared into the day sky.I could not stop taking about it then the next day my mother said there was an article in the paper about an advertising craft seen in the sky. it all made sense at the time ,i thought as a 6 year old "oh teah just like on the bugs bunny cartoon when the spaceship had lights around it saying "eat at joes".
it was the happened to be in the same direction of the ocean as when i saw something large and metallic the year before 2008 that looked just like the craft i saw as a child, also sometime in june, it plunged in the ocean and never came out i was watching the sunset from my living room window.
the incident last summer i awoke at 3:30 in the morning and out my window where the ocean is at least a half a mile down i have abroad view of it due to living on a hill,when i awoke the was the brightest light coming from it seems like the edge of the earth where it curves though i do not know how far my visibility is.This light was so bright the were huge shadows of me on my walls and as bright and far away the source was coming from there was no way it was from a boat or any kind of earthly vessel,it stayed lit for about 20 minutes,although it was early i tried to call my neighbor to verify what i was seeing and the phones were oddly busy,you know that fast busy sound,not a normal one.
content.summary: Bright light coming from ocean too bright to be a ship

content.detailedDescription:
My mom and i were drivin home from the store and she thought that she could try and scare me. she saw three lights in the sky and said,"hey, is that a ufo?" and i looked and said," no, thats the signal tower."
so we were almost to the house when all of a sudden, we notied that the lights were practically hovering very slowly. my mom stopped the car on the side of the road and we looked out the window, and the lights stopped right over our house for about five seconds then it started slowly moving toward us. my mom started the car and she parked it on the drive-way, and the aircraft was very low to the ground...It looked like it was landing but the airport was farther than where it was landing. there was no sound coming from it...So we went inside and looked up triangular ufo's on google and they had a video that some guy taped at 3:15 am. we looked at the video and the thing he saw was exactly the thing we saw. very creepy!!
content.summary: Black triangle, three white lights on each corner, and one blinking red light underneath.

content.detailedDescription:
On friday july 18, 2008, at about 10:30 pm, a co-worker and i were taking a 15 minute break on the stern of the ss horizons edge boston, a casino cruise ship and company i was employed for at the time out of lynn, ma. we were drifting on the outer edge of the stellwagen bank marine sanctuary during casino hours. as we started to make our way back inside the vessel to return to work, we heard a loud "whooshing" sound from about 10 to 15 degrees off the port-bow. this is not an uncommon occurence as waves continually hit the bow; especially during inclement weather. but we knew right away the sound was a bit "off". we hurried to the port side of the stern and saw what seemed to be a spectral, greenish, faint-glowing, disc shaped object (at best estimate, about 50 to 100 feet in diameter and about 500 feet out) come clear out of the water and hover for what seemed to be 45 seconds or so. we both confirmed with each other, that we could "feel" or somewhat "sense" heat coming from the object...(and subsequently would both later suffer from unusal yet uneventful bouts of dehydration and cold-like symptoms regardless of how the amount of fluids we drank.) the object then rose sharply to about 1000 feet and shot away, aft and ascending, until we couldnt see it anymore... that particular movement of the object took less than 10 seconds... there was absolutely no sound of any kind and the erradic movements it made as it came out of the water, was as if someone were hoisting this thing up on the end of a chain and it sawyed a bit back and forth. i have never seen anything like it before or since. naturally, i have never mentioned this incident to anyone for fear of any social reprisal... and we have subsequently, stopped speaking to each other all together. i have only mentioned it here, and will probably never mention it again. i just had to tell someone.


js
content.summary: The incident at stellwagen bank.

content.detailedDescription:
late night in aug.1989 i was driving my 3 boys home on the long bch. frwy going west. my exit bell ave, was about a half mile away so i pulled over to the right lane. there was an older model car going very slow in front of me.I was frustrated, but decided just to bear it out. i glanced off to the left of the freeway, which is elevated quite a bit above the actual street level of the surrounding city.
   i thought something looked real strange, a large part of the street lights..All lights, were blacked out except for some tiny brilliant white blue lights arranged in a pattern on top of a huge blackish/dull dark grey object. i decided to pull off to the side of the freeway and get out for a better look. the car in front of me also pulled off to the side in front of me. we were both right at the mouth of my off ramp, bell. 
i got out of the car, left the kids in the car for safety reasons and the old couple in the car in front of me got out too. we stood there silent watching this thing. i at first thought these were helicopters maybe spraying malathion, but there was no noise, at all. then i noticed that the lights were fixed, not like helicopters and they were bluish white and intense.The body of this thing was huge, way bigger than a couple of football fields, triangular, solid and the color of the body was real dark so you couldn't actually see it, except for the city lights blacked out underneath.All of a sudden i became aware that "you were not meant to see this" in a stern sort of benign way, and it slowly started taking off,silent, forward and up at a slight angle. it banked left in  front of some hills, it blacked out the lights, that's how i could see it still. it kept banking left with it's roof? facing me the whole time and once it was facing east, towards palm springs it just super blasted off. it had just taken me an hour to drive from where it disappeared, but it was gone in maybe 10 seconds!I watched it disappear and when i turned back the other couple was leaving. they said they hadn't any idea why they stopped and hadn't seen anything.I was flabbergasted!Here i had just seen the most important thing in my life!When i saw the phx lites, i freaked out.
i was scared, excited and awed and i will never forget it!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I saw the top of a large triangular shape ufo

content.detailedDescription:
At 5:30pm in the afternoon. while waiting for my daughter in the playground. this place is just over the hilltop and i was awestruck as i looked up the sky and saw this cloud formation: take note of the beautiful ring like structure. looks like a flower! as my daughter described it. so i had to take a photo of it. but frustratingly i just had my nokia x3 phone equipped with a crappy 3.2megapixel camera with me. i took the shot.

so as i went home to take a look at my creation, i didn't expect too much, but to my amazement i noticed a dark object included.

i could not explain what could this object be? this area has a lot of low flying bats at that time. and when i took the shot i just snapped away focusing on the ring. i couldn't see anything due to the tiny screen of the phone.

i don't know how to explain but if anyone can analyze this photo. i would be very thankful for your inputs.

you will have to zoom into the photo to see the object on the left. is it a bat? a bird? a commercial aircraft from a distance?
content.summary: 5:30pm philippines over at a hilltop playground

content.detailedDescription:
I was riding in the backseat of a car going west on interstate 90 toward spokane valley about 5 p.M. march 6, 2010. the two other people in the car and myself spotted this object in the sky above some hills to the southwest. it appeared to be hanging out stationary in the sky, but i cannot confirm this because i was in a moving car. if it was moving, it was not moving very much.

i looked at the object through the zoom on my small digital camera and still was not able to figure out what it was. we got off the freeway in spokane valley and began driving south toward the object, but we lost sight of it behind the hills when our elevation changed and were unsure how to find it again, so we gave up.

we drove the same route the next morning, and the object wasn't there. all three of us are natives to the area and have never seen such a thing. our first thought was it may be a hot air balloon, but we haven't ever seen one of that shape.
content.summary: Rocket-shaped object appeared to hang stationary in the sky
